revealingFields.helpText: This is GB followed by 12 numbers. For example, 123456789012. This must match the details you provided for your Transitional Simplified Procedures (TSP) registration.

sections.title: You cannot use this service because your business does not have a UK Economic Operators Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.infoText:
Find out how to [get an EORI number](https://www.gov.uk/eori?step-by-step-nav=db1149f5-f60a-4d02-be0c-9c9db2828665).

Once you have this, you can come back to activate your badge to make CHIEF declarations.

sections.title: You cannot use this service yet because your business has not received the DTI badge it wants to activate for CHIEF

fields.infoText:
You need to contact a Community Service Provider (CSP) who will issue you with a DTI badge. [Find a Community Service Provider](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/chief-customs-freight-simplified-procedures-cfsp-contact-list/customs-freight-simplified-procedures-air-or-port-community-service-providers-of-direct-trader-input-dti-links-to-chief).
 

Once you have your new DTI badge, you need to activate it using this form before you make any declarations.

sections.title: Which Community Service Provider (CSP) issued your DTI badge?

fields.label: Which Community Service Provider (CSP) issued your DTI badge?
choices: Destin8 (this is also known as FCP or MCP)

fields.label: What is a CSP?
fields.infoText: CHIEF connects with 5 Community System Providers (CSPs). These are independent trade systems that serve carriers, transit sheds and freight forwarders. CSPs record and track the movement of goods within ports, to help them run more efficiently. You must get your DTI badge from a CSP.

fields.infoText:
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

We have received your request to access CHIEF for Transitional Simplified Procedures.

We will respond within XX days

For further information see the [TSP guidance page](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/register-for-simplified-import-procedures-if-the-uk-leaves-the-eu-without-a-deal). 

After you complete this form, you will also need to request an entry data capture service (EDCS) role & location to be able to submit supplementary declarations. You can do this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/import-and-export-trade-request-for-chief-access-via-wex-channels-pa7

[What did you think of this service?](https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4830827/Feedback-Transitional-Simplified-Procedures) (takes 30 seconds)
